item.title: Kernel Hardening Tips
item.description: Disable and blacklist Linux modules Misal kita ingin blacklist module firewire_core, maka kita buat file /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist-firewire.conf yang isinya blacklist firewire_core install firewire_core /bin/true Referensi: CIS_Red_Hat_Enterprise_Linux_7_Benchmark_v2.2.0.pdf https://linux-audit.com/kernel-hardening-disable-and-blacklist-linux-modules/
